description: Ulm University is seeking to hire an Assistant Professor of Software Engineering to strengthen research and teaching in practical computer science.
The successful candidate will propose a research program that complements the institute and faculty's expertise.
Experience in acquiring third-party funding and collaborative research is advantageous.
Basic instruction is in German with advanced courses available in English.
requirements: Special aptitude for academic work demonstrated by quality of doctorate
summary.employment_type: Temporary civil servant or as an employee, generally for a fixed term of 6 years
additional_information: The university aims to increase the proportion of women in research and teaching.
Qualified female scientists are particularly encouraged to apply.
Severely disabled applicants with equal aptitude will receive preferential consideration.

contact_person.name: Prof. Dr. Matthias Tichy
contact_person.position: Head of the Institute of Software Engineering and Programming Languages, Dean of the Faculty of Engineering, Computer Science, and Psychology
